PositionReferenceConfiguration
autoConfig
bool autoConfig

Indicates whether the position reference is automatically determined (position value ignored if true).

position
Position position

The reference position value.

source (get)
uint8 source() const

Uses the autoConfig and position values to determine the source ID to send to the device.

fromResponseData
static PositionReferenceConfiguration fromResponseData(
MipFieldValues resData
)

Builds a PositionReferenceConfiguration object from a MipFieldValues object with format: uint8  - source double[3]  - position
